newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil's Cardoso, lawyers discuss CVRD strategy.
newsitem.headline: Brazil's Cardoso, lawyers discuss CVRD strategy.

text.p: Brazilian President Fernando Henrique Cardoso was meeting with government lawyers to work out strategy in the face of a series of injunctions against the sale of Companhia Vale do Rio Doce (CVRD), judicial sources said early Monday evening.
Chief Federal Attorney Geraldo Quintao was meeting with Cardoso after the rejection of the government's appeal against an injunction granted by a Sao Paulo judge, the sources said.
"We are concerned about the possibility of last-minute injunctions and fear the chances of the auction going ahead without hitch are diminishing," one high-ranking source said.
